items.sentence: The police believe that Tom was involved in last week's robbery.
I wouldn't say that Mary is gorgeous, but she isn't ugly either.
Tom couldn't open the jar, so Tom asked Mary to open it for him.
As I mentioned last week, I'll be spending the summer in Boston.
That portrait reminds me of someone that I knew a long time ago.
It probably wouldn't have been that hard to do that by yourself.
There's a time to learn and a time to apply what you've learned.
Mary feels that her husband doesn't pay enough attention to her.
Tom had the sense to get out of there before things turned sour.
I remembered that I left my keys inside after I closed the door.
